page.title: Professional Headshots | Northern Virginia | Marquel Yvette Photography
page.description: Clean, modern professional headshots for Northern Virginia professionals and business owners. Easy booking, flattering lighting, fast turnaround.
page.keywords: professional headshots, corporate headshots, business headshots, Northern Virginia, DC metro, South Riding, Ashburn, Chantilly

hero.title: Professional Headshots For Northern Virginia Professionals
hero.subtitle: Clean, modern headshots for professionals and business owners in Northern Virginia and the DC metro area. I make the process easy, even if you do not like being in front of the camera.
hero.locationText: Studio in South Riding, serving Ashburn, Chantilly, Leesburg, Reston, and the DC metro area.
hero.heroImageAlt: Professional business headshot example showing clean lighting and modern style
hero.pillText: Booked by executives, business owners, and professionals across Northern Virginia.

benefits.sectionIntro: Most people hate getting their photo taken. My job is to help you feel comfortable, look like yourself, and walk away with a headshot you are proud to share on LinkedIn, your website, and anywhere your name shows up.

cards.title: Guided Posing
cards.description: I coach you through expression, posture, and angles so you never feel stiff, lost, or unsure what to do with your hands.

cards.title: Clean, Modern Lighting
cards.description: Light that flatters your features, keeps your skin tone true, and feels polished without looking overdone.

cards.title: Images You Actually Use
cards.description: Headshots designed for LinkedIn, company sites, speaking engagements, and press features so you can show up consistently.

pricing.sectionIntro: Clear, simple pricing with flexibility to choose only the images you love.

packages.title: The Express
packages.description: Perfect for busy professionals who need polished headshots quickly.

packages.title: The Signature
packages.description: Our comprehensive session for professionals who want variety and options.

packages.title: The Executive
packages.description: The ultimate headshot experience for established professionals who need a complete image library.

packages.title: Team And Workplace
packages.description: On site or in studio headshots for your leadership team or staff. Pricing based on number of people and locations.

howItWorks.sectionIntro: A simple process that keeps you comfortable and confident from start to finish.

steps.title: Book Your Session
steps.description: Choose a date and time that works for you and confirm your session online in just a few clicks.

steps.title: Prepare With The Checklist
steps.description: Use the free headshot checklist to decide what to wear, how to prep, and what to bring so you arrive ready.

steps.title: Enjoy Your Shoot And Final Images
steps.description: During your session I guide you through posing and expression, then deliver polished high end images ready to use.

testimonials.sectionIntro: Professionals across Northern Virginia trust me to create headshots that match the level of work they do.

items.quote: I usually dread photos, but Marquel made me feel relaxed within minutes. My new headshot looks polished and still feels like me.
items.author: Senior Director, Technology

items.quote: The entire process was simple and efficient. I booked online, showed up, and left with several images I can use across my business.
items.author: Small Business Owner, Northern Virginia

items.quote: I needed an updated headshot for a promotion announcement. Marquel guided every detail and the final result is exactly what I wanted.
items.author: Operations Leader, Financial Services

busyProfessionals.sectionTitle: Too Busy For A Full Session
busyProfessionals.sectionIntro: I offer options designed for busy professionals who still want a high quality image.

cards.title: Express Sessions
cards.description: Short focused sessions that fit into a lunch break or between meetings, without sacrificing quality.

cards.title: On Site Headshots
cards.description: I can come to your workplace or event so your team can be photographed without leaving the office.

cards.title: Flexible Scheduling
cards.description: Limited early morning, evening, and weekend appointments are available for demanding schedules.

ctaButton.text: Request Express Or On Site Session

leadMagnet.description: Not quite ready to book but tired of guessing what to wear or how to prep? This free checklist gives you a simple plan so you arrive confident and camera ready.
benefits: Outfit guidance that works on camera.
Tips for hair, grooming, and glasses.
What to bring so you have options.
How to choose the right background for your brand.

form.disclaimer: By submitting, you agree to receive occasional emails with headshot tips and studio updates. You can unsubscribe at any time.

items.question: How long does a typical session take?
items.answer: Most professional sessions last about one hour, which includes time to review images and make sure we have several strong options.

items.question: Do you help with posing and expression?
items.answer: Yes. I guide you through every pose and help you find expressions that look relaxed, confident, and natural so you never feel unsure.

items.question: When will I receive my final images?
items.answer: Proofs are typically delivered within two business days. Once you choose your favorites, final retouched images are delivered quickly after that.

items.question: Can you photograph my leadership team or staff?
items.answer: Yes. I offer custom workplace and team headshot options. Share a few details about your team size and location and I will provide a tailored quote.
